title: PoliceOne
description: The PoliceOne.com app is the best way for Police Officers and other Law Enforcement professionals to keep informed while on-duty or on the move. Stay up to date on breaking police news, videos, expert columnist articles, tactical tips and other relevant information. Whether you need to research something from your squad car or just want to browse the latest news, this app gives officers FREE access to mobile resources that have never been available to them before.
